Slitherine Games was founded in 2006 by a group of passionate gamers and developers with a shared love for strategy games. The company’s initial focus was on creating historical wargames, drawing inspiration from classic titles like “Panzer General” and “Close Combat.” The founders envisioned a company that would deliver immersive and challenging experiences, faithfully recreating historical battles and campaigns.

Evolution and Expansion

Over the years, Slitherine Games has expanded its horizons, venturing into different genres and platforms. While maintaining its strong foundation in historical wargames, the company has diversified its portfolio to include titles like:

  • Science Fiction Strategy:Slitherine has developed games like “Starship Troopers: Terran Command” and “Battlefleet Gothic: Armada 2,” offering players exciting space battles and strategic campaigns.
  • Fantasy Strategy:The company has also delved into the realm of fantasy with titles like “Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader” and “Total War: Warhammer,” allowing players to engage in epic battles between legendary factions.
  • Modern Warfare:Slitherine has explored contemporary conflicts with games like “Steel Division 2” and “War in the East,” providing players with realistic simulations of modern warfare.

Key Milestones and Game Releases

Slitherine Games has achieved significant milestones and released numerous successful games throughout its history. Some of the key highlights include:

  • 2011:The company releases “War in the East,” a real-time strategy game focusing on the Eastern Front of World War II.
